plot outline: Raghu Karhe i sin 10 year long battle with forest department to get back his land.He along with is sons Bala ,Panda his wife daughter in law and grandson wander Sheep from one village to another.A Balu a wrestler dreams big and wants his family to have stable work rather then wandering from village to village.He comes across Ashokrao who and his men terrorize the neighboring village by looting their Sheep's.When Balu empowers Ashokrao's wrestlers not once but twice which hurts his ego and wants him dead.
title: Khwada
plot: "It is a story about shepherds who suffer from land acquisition by the forest department and how their dreams of a settlement get shattered by different obstacles, leading them to migrate permanently."

Raghu Karhe i sin 10 year long battle with forest department to get back his land.He along with is sons Bala ,Panda his wife daughter in law and grandson wander Sheep from one village to another.A Balu a wrestler dreams big and wants his family to have stable work rather then wandering from village to village.He comes across Ashokrao who and his men terrorize the neighboring village by looting their Sheep's.When Balu empowers Ashokrao's wrestlers not once but twice which hurts his ego and wants him dead.::alex.mjacko@gmail.com
